   "body_snippet": "I've noticed that RDP connections don't size the screen display/resolution correctly in windows 10.  If i have a high resolution but the zoom is set to 150% mRemoteNG doesn't pass that zoom through to the RDP session like Windows Remote Desktop will.  You can see the difference on how small the text is in mRemoteNG vs Windows RD\r\n\r\n![Windows RD](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42389197/87560979-46d61880-c679-11ea-8a88-64780cb68182.PNG)\r\n![mRemoteNG](https://user-images.githubuserconten...",

@@ -66,8 +78,8 @@
   "last_synced": "2026-02-15T09:52:50Z",
   "notes": "AI triage (claude): DeviceScaleFactor is hardcoded to 100 in RdpProtocol.cs instead of auto-detecting the local device DPI, causing blurry or incorrectly scaled RDP sessions when the host system uses >100% DPI scaling.\nApproach: Replace hardcoded DeviceScaleFactor=100 with a computed value from ResolutionScalingFactor (same DPI source already used for DesktopScaleFactor Auto mode), ensuring both extended properties reflect actual device DPI.",
   "token_usage": {

-    "cost_usd": 0.275443

+    "cost_usd": 1.304412
   }
 }

   "body_snippet": "This exception will force mRemoteNG to close. Cannot access a disposed object. Object name: 'ConnectionWindow'.\r\n\r\n## Expected Behavior\r\nReporting a bug. When closing a saved SSH connection window, the window should close.\r\n\r\n\r\n## Current Behavior\r\nWhen closing a saved SSH connection window, an unhandled exception has occurred window pops up and force closes mRemoteNG. See error below:\r\n\r\n   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.MarshaledInvoke(Control caller, Delegate method, Object[] args, Boolean s...",
-  "our_status": "new",
-  "priority": null,
+  "our_status": "triaged",
+  "priority": "P2-bug",
   "target_release": null,
   "our_branch": null,
   "our_pr": null,
-  "iterations": [],
+  "iterations": [
+    {
+      "seq": 1,
+      "date": "2026-02-21",
+      "type": "triaged",
+      "description": "Verified ObjectDisposedException crash when closing SSH connection window — protocol fires Prot_Event_Closed after ConnectionWindow is already disposed, causing unhandled exception that terminates the app.",
+      "token_usage": {
+        "input_tokens": 4,
+        "output_tokens": 583,
+        "cost_usd": 0.150976,
+        "operations": 1

@@ -44,5 +57,10 @@
   "needs_action": true,
   "waiting_for_us": false,
   "last_synced": "2026-02-15T09:52:50Z",
-  "notes": ""
+  "notes": "AI triage (claude): Verified ObjectDisposedException crash when closing SSH connection window — protocol fires Prot_Event_Closed after ConnectionWindow is already disposed, causing unhandled exception that terminates the app.\nApproach: In Prot_Event_Closed, add IsDisposed/Disposing guard before Control.Invoke so the callback is silently ignored if the window was already disposed during closure.",
+  "token_usage": {
+    "input_tokens": 4,
+    "output_tokens": 583,
